parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Close the currently active user dialog with exit code. Most common exit codes are:
<code>#define IDC_OK            1 //emulate "Ok" button</code>
<code>#define IDC_CANCEL        2 //emulate "Cancel" button</code>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''closeDialog''' exitcode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> exitcode : [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[closeDialog]] 2;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>#define IDC_CANCEL 2
[[closeDialog]] IDC_CANCEL;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createDialog]], [[dialog]], [[closeDisplay]]
</value></part></template>
